revised_title: Embryological Development and Comparative Analysis of Nebalia Bipes
tldr: The author examines the embryological development of the crustacean Nebalia Bipes, providing a detailed analysis of its external form and internal structures. They compare its development to other crustaceans, discussing similarities and differences in morphology and embryonic stages. The study contributes to the understanding of crustacean evolution and development.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Developmental Biology
